name: Surf Friends
description:
Chase your surf trophie across the southwest while exploring and playing games a long the way, 

Start at home then travel to the beach where your surf trophies disperses!

Next go to LA to fight earthquakes then travel into Arizona. 

In Arizona you will trap squirrels and then find your trophie just for it to go missing again.

In New Mexico the same thing happens but you get to explore an art museum. 

In Texas you get to heard animals, learn Texas facts and then find your trophie and go back home.
